2009/1/20 lancezant <lance.zant@...>:
> Not sure I follow. Are you suggesting to pass the class under test as
> a parameter to a factory via the test constructor? From what I've
> seen, parameterized tests seem aimed in a very different direction.

No, I just meant that you create an array of singleton arrays of
instances of the interface as the parameters, and the test is run once
for each instance.

--Nat
